headline: Oil Prices Tumbled to Worst Day in Nearly Three Years
summary: Energy prices got slammed by fears of a global economic slowdown stemming from President Trump's tariff plan, and OPEC and its market allies piled pressure onto the U.S. energy industry by open up the spigots.  U.S. oil futures fell 6.6%, or $4.76 a barrel to close at $66.95, their worst day on a percentage basis since July 2022, when a spike after Russia's invasion of Ukraine was unwinding.  Futures started selling off while Trump was still talking about his tariff plan Wednesday afternoon.

headline: Oil Prices Are Crashing
summary: Energy prices are getting slammed by fears of a global economic slowdown stemming from President Trump's tariff plan, and OPEC and its market allies are piling pressure onto the U.S. energy industry by turn up the spigots.  U.S. oil futures fell more than 7% in early trading, on track for their worst day since 2022, when a spike after Russia's invasion of Ukraine was unwinding.  Futures started selling off while Trump was still talking about his tariff plan Wednesday afternoon.

U.S. oil futures fell more than 7% in early trading, on track for their worst day since 2022, when a spike after Russia's invasion of Ukraine was unwinding.  Futures started selling off while Trump was still talking about his tariff plan Wednesday afternoon.

headline: Bumbershoot Holdings 2024 Investor Letter
summary: Bumbershoot had over 10+ companies drop more than -15% in Dec. 2024. So, why does Bumbershoot actually believe 2024 was a solid year? Find out.
